sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.Gauge</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Minor functions to manipulate gauges</description>
        <name>Gauge</name>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.include("PrototypeServer");

var Gauge = Class.create();

Gauge.prototype = {
  initialize: function(id) {
     this.gauge = new GlideGauge(id);
     this.id = id;
  },

  setName: function(name) {
     this.gauge.setName(name);
     this.gauge.setTitle(name);
     this.gauge.update();
  },

  z: function() {}
}
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2008-04-05 19:38:33</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2018e7d9c0a80165005c45f7664c92b1</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>93</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Gauge</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="UI Pages (define HTML pages and their processing)" source="com.glide.ui_page">fd2338603c31311068bcf327dfe37f15</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2018e7d9c0a80165005c45f7664c92b1</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>pat.casey</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2009-11-10 01:37:42</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
